CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Academy relative to Crimson Foundation?
SRP.A: Luminara Academy is {above} Crimson Foundation in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Foundation relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Crimson Foundation is {below} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Foundation}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luminara Academy}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Foundation's minimum Publication Count in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Foundation's minimum Publication Count is in {1961}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Academy's minimum Publication Count in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Academy's minimum Publication Count is in {1966}.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1972, was the average total Publication Count higher or lower than between 1960 and 1961?
NC.A: The average total publication count between 1963 and 1972 was {lower} than between 1960 and 1961.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1971, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1969?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1967 and 1971 was {larger} than between 1963 and 1969.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1965, was the average total Publication Count higher or lower than between 1967 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total publication count between 1963 and 1965 was {higher} than between 1967 and 1972.

NC.Q: Was the total Publication Count in 1963 higher or lower than in 1972?
NC.A: The total publication count in 1963 was {higher} than in 1972.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Foundation} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Foundation and Luminara Academy first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Foundation and Luminara Academy first exchanged leading positions in {1964}.
